AAL.caption: List of Bubble File URLs
AAL.doc: Pass a list of bubble file URLS to presign (current beta max is 10 files).
AAL.name: file_urls

AAQ.caption: Bubble File URL
AAQ.doc: Pass a bubble file URL to presign.
AAQ.name: file_url

AAR.caption: List of files?
AAR.doc: Tick this box if you would like to send a list of urls. Disables the single file input.
AAR.name: fileList

AAX.caption: Validate Domain?
AAX.doc: This is an experimental feature to validate the URLs provided in the plugin call. This uses a comma separated list of whitelisted domains in addition to the bubble.io domain. This ensures that the API calls are not sent to an unexpected external service. Provide whitelisted domains in the plugin settings (e.g. myapp.com,d1234.bubble.is,yourapp.bubbleapps.io....any others)
AAX.name: validate_domain
